title: TaoTao Ehonkan Sekai Doubutsu Banashi
synopsis: In a valley in China which has never been visited by humans lives a little panda named Tao Tao. Together with his friends Kiki the monkey, Puhu the squirrel and Poe the hare, they play in the forest all day long.
staff: [['Nakahara, Shuuichi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Chief Animation Director', ' Art Director']], ['Ozeki, Masayuki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Ochiai, Masamune', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Ooseki, Masayuki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
